channel.title: How do i add new items?
channel.description: hey, i was just wondering how i can add new items... and like make customs.. WITHOUT the item def editor or whatever in th e files because mine doesnt have one.. so yeah if you could tell me how to make and add customs or how to jsut add new items... and like ad them to the shops...

item.title: How do i add new items?
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

Depends on what base you have I guess. I believe Delta loads item ints from Class8, but in Project Insanity they are loaded from the ItemDef class. Also, as Love stated above, you will need to get a new model header so the new items can be loaded properly.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add new items?

item.title: How do i add new items?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

unless you are planning on adding a new revision of items (such as 634 items instead of 474 items) You NEED a loader for custom models (aka itemdef)

Read full topic
